name: All for One (itch)
description:
All for One

Its all about using the bodies of your former lives to get ahead.  Play the game to find all the exciting ways you can use a former friend.

Created for the PIGSquad Summer Slow Jams: One More Time
  • Restrictions: We had to use only 3 buttons and 3 colors for our game.
  • Created in one week by two people
Controls

A/D or left arrow / right arrow for movement
Space to jump

PS4 Controller (Windows build only)

Left/Right on the dpad for movement
X to jump

Created By Cameron Alsbrook Daniel Matos Programming, Game Design, Music Art, Animation tw: @calsbrook
insta: @panoni insta: @dans_illustrations
